inclusion.criterion: Surgical documentation of Pan Labral Lesion of shoulder
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: other confounding pathology such as nerve deficit, chondral damage, rotator cuff tear
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 62-year-old African-American man with left upper and lower extremity weakness, dark visual spot in right eye, facial numbness, facial drop and slurred speech. Hypertension, hyperlipidemia and hypothyroidism history.
